snippet.title: Arkos (Zigurat/Arcadia) (1988) (Amstrad CPC)
snippet.description:
(See All Text For English)
Con mayor colorido y mejor sonido, Arkos para Amstrad es igual de regular y difícil que en Spectrum.
Para ver el juego completo, ir al vídeo de Spectrum.

With more colours and better sound, Arkos for Amstrad is just as difficult and dull as the Spectrum version.
The full game walk through, in the Spectrum video.
